title: Rithvik Madhavaram
text:
I’m Rithvik Madhavaram, currently pursuing a Master’s in Data Analytics Engineering at George Mason University. I hold a Bachelor’s in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology. My skills include Python, C, Java, and Verilog, with experience in data structures and algorithms.
I have worked on projects such as a face detection system using OpenCV and a Turbo coder for error correction in digital communication. My internships at Hindustan Aeronautics Limited and IBM have provided me with valuable insights into hydraulic systems and artificial intelligence.
Beyond academics, I enjoy dancing, listening to music, playing cricket, and watching Formula 1. I am passionate about leveraging my skills to contribute to innovative solutions in data analytics.

title: Rithvikmadhavaram
text:
I am Rithvik Madhavaram, a passionate and driven individual currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Data Analytics Engineering at George Mason University in Fairfax, Virginia. With a strong academic foundation in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology in Hyderabad, I have developed a solid understanding of programming languages such as Python, C, and Java, alongside critical concepts in data structures and algorithms.
Throughout my educational journey, I have engaged in various projects that reflect my technical capabilities and creativity. Notable projects include developing a face detection system using OpenCV, creating a portfolio website to showcase my skills, and designing a Turbo coder for error correction in digital communication systems. My current major project involves utilizing Arduino and ultrasonic sensors for hand gesture control of computer operations.
My professional experience includes internships with Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) and IBM, where I gained valuable insights into hydraulic monitoring systems and artificial intelligence, respectively. These experiences have honed my analytical skills and allowed me to apply theoretical knowledge to practical scenarios.
In addition to my technical skills, I pride myself on my leadership, communication, and decision-making abilities. I actively participated in clubs such as the Chaitanya Astra Club and Makers of India Club, where I collaborated with peers on innovative initiatives.
Outside of my academic and professional pursuits, I enjoy dancing, listening to music, playing cricket, and watching Formula 1 races. I am eager to leverage my skills and experiences to contribute to innovative solutions in the field of data analytics and beyond.
